subject: Horse Racing
Libel and Slander
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for the man who alleges that Ahmed Zayat has failed to pay a $2 million gambling debt filed a $10 million libel suit on Monday.
snippet: The lawyer for the man who alleges that Ahmed Zayat has failed to pay a $2 million gambling debt filed a $10 million libel suit on Monday.
